R code created during meeting.

```{r}
data(mtcars)
library(tidyverse)

cor.test(mtcars$wt, mtcars$mpg)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) + 
	geom_point() +
	geom_smooth(method = 'lm')

lm.out <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(lm.out)
```
